thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 76 of 625
thread.title: Jessica Carrasquillo

author: Jessica Carrasquillo
title: Jessica Carrasquillo
text: I really love that you do sizing at the beginning - I feel that this way I won't be shown products that I could not get in my size; and it of course saves a step for each product I order. I also like the VIP membership. I usually hate anything that will auto charge etc - but the fact that the balance can THEN be used to purchase something instead of just completely lost is AWESOME.
